entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
